text.en-US: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, even for commercial purposes. If others remix, adapt, or build upon the material, they must license the modified material under identical terms.

summary.en-US: Youtube Comment Analyzer analyzes the sentiment of Youtube comments to give you a good overview of the feelings of the community.

description.en-US: Youtube Comment Analyzer analyzes the sentiment of Youtube comments to give you a good overview of the feelings of the community.
